name: one-global-automation-tests
description: Automated testing suite using Playwright for One Global application

scripts.test:brazil: export DESTINATION=BR && export CURRENCY=EUR && export COUNTRY=BR && playwright test tests/validate.currency.spec.ts --grep @$CURRENCY @$COUNTRY
scripts.test:thailand: export DESTINATION=THA && export CURRENCY=EUR && export COUNTRY=THA && playwright test tests/validate.currency.spec.ts --grep @$CURRENCY @$COUNTRY
scripts.test:validate: export CURRENCY=$CURRENCY export COUNTRY=$COUNTRY && playwright test tests/validate.currency.spec.ts --grep @$CURRENCY @$COUNTRY
